title: [BUG] Client Error
body:
This has existed for ages (years?) without being fixed, so maybe I should mention it.

The 'Profile: Overview' tab has a counter thing for ARAM rerolls (with active boosts and hextech chests available) that is frequently wrong.
It will say '0 rerolls, 0/250 progress' when at 1-2 rerolls available. This isn't an infrequent thing, it happens every day.

As I get more than 250 points per game (based on champions owned), I know that I should always have at least 1 reroll unless I have queue dodged or DC'd (for whatever reason).

It is so unreliable as a function, that it may as well not exist.
